headline: Applied Materials (AMAT) Stock Upgraded to Buy as BofA Targets $250 on DRAM Strength
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is one of the AI Stocks in Focus on Wall Street. On October 13, Bank of America upgraded the stock to “Buy” from Neutral with a $250 price target. The firm believes that the semiconductor stock’s valuation is attractive. The rating upgrade reflects prospects of wafer fab equipment, or WFE, growth in […]

headline: Bernstein Keeps Outperform Rating on Applied Materials (AMAT)
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is one of the 11 Best American Semiconductor Stocks to Invest In. On October 3, Bernstein reiterated its Outperform rating on Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) and kept the price target at $195. This decision came after Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) said in a filing that a new US rule would hurt […]
